name: Ceandra “Cece” Hill
text: My dog haircut was ok looking. The lady that groomed my schnauzer did admit she nicked his ear. Got home to find out that his left eye was red in the corner. Wont be going back. I recommend bath barks and bubbles. Did not have this problem and groomers are top notch.

resp.text: Ms. Hill - Thank you for the feedback. Again, we are very sorry this happened during Chopper’s visit to Lucky Dog back in January. It is never a good day when a pup goes home with a boo boo. We strive to be as gentle and safe with the pets in our care as we can, but unfortunately, sometimes these things do happen and it breaks our hearts. You did fail to mention, though, that your Schnauzer is a puppy, was in for his first ever haircut and had barely been handled prior coming here. This, of course, does not excuse the incident, but it does give context to the situation. Schnauzers get a very short blade on their heads and Chopper was in the process of having his head shaved when he jerked in reaction to a sound in the salon causing his groomer to lightly graze the edge of the top of his ear. Our Salon Manager handled Chopper’s service and her incident rate was zero for the last year until this happened for which she was upfront and honest with you about and you told us you understood and even re-booked your next appointment. It was an incredibly minor nick as her reflexes are quick and it did not bleed. Again, we are very sorry that this happened to Chopper. We take things like this very seriously as it hurts us to see it happen, too. No groomer ever wants to accidentally injure a dog while in their care, but again, unfortunately, it is a trade risk when working with wiggly animals, especially puppies, and surgically sharpened equipment. Again, we deeply apologize and hope that you’ll reconsider letting us take care of Chopper in the future. Additionally, I urge you to compare our reviews to those of the salon you recommended. You’ll find they too have incidents happen and yours is our first complaint since we’ve been open. Thanks again for your feedback. ❤️

name: Avery Rhodes Akins
text: Lucky Dog is the BEST.  Not only do they go above and beyond with their grooming techniques but also truly care about and love our dogs!  Our dog Honey LOVES to go to Lucky Dog.  This past spring, we lost our older dog, Teddy, to a genetic disease that caused him to lose his ability to walk.  We will never forget the compassion shown by the Lucky Dog staff to help us get him bathed despite his lack of mobility and huge size, not to mention their sympathy for us after his death.  Thanks Alyssa, Magan, and Teddy’s favorite caretaker, Roxanne, for being excellent, kind, professional, and full of integrity.

You can not find better people and/or groomers in the Birmingham area!

name: Frantina Wilson
text: I have to say I had heard negative things about Piper's from friends, but I continued to use them because we had always had good experiences with them. However, I really can't give Piper's a good review after my 4 babies latest visit over Thanksgiving weekend. We took more than enough of everything that our 2 dogs and 2 cats would need for a stay that spanned from Wednesday night - Sunday night. When we picked them up and got home we noticed left over food for the dogs, we took separate bags for each dog for each day, so was there a day that the dogs were not fed. In addition, MOST of the food we took for the cats was still in the bag...that concerns me as well. My 18 month old cat came home extremely jittery and has been jumping at the slightest noise. I can't say that Piper's did anything wrong, but I will say that our furbies did not come home happy this time. The cats will probably never go back and I will have to think long and hard about taking the dogs back too. The staff, as always, was great in their interactions with me.

text: Our family dog is well-behaved for our crew that includes 3 kids ages 5-11. He loves to fetch baseballs, run, play, and frolic in the occasional Alabama snowfalls but he doesn't get out to socialize often with other people or dogs, so he can act territorially aggressive when kenneled once or twice a year. We've kenneled him other places before, but he came home the happiest when we used Piper's. He came home clean and happy, and the staff seemed upbeat and positive both at drop-off and pick-up. I know he's likely not the most easygoing dog for which they provide services, but our family appreciates them for their professionalism and care.

text: I have three hyper-active brindled rescued dogs that absolutely love this place, they begin going nuts when we are still blocks away. When my dogs are there for daycare, boarding, or day school they come home completely worn out and sleep/lay around for the next two days. They groomers do wonderful work. I cannot begin to express my gratitude to the wonderful people who work there for giving me peace of mind while I am away. I highly recommend entrusting your pet with these wonderful people for all of your pet care needs.

name: Tessey Johnson
text: I am very happy with everyone from Piper's Playhouse. They had my babies Casey and Daisy for 3 days, I was able to see pictures of them on their facebook page to see how they were doing. But the most impressive to me was how when my trip home got messed up because of the weather, they stayed late so I could get my babies back instead of having to wait another day. I had missed them so much so this meant the world to me. I would gladly take my babies back to stay with them. Thank you all so much

name: kala mitchell
text: My pup has been going to pipers for almost 3 years now. Even though my pup started daycare at an early age she isnt very social towards other dogs. However she isnt aggressive. The staff at pipers recognized this right away and made accommodations to make her feel safe. While she is visiting she is allowed a safe place to withdraw when the interaction of other dogs is just too much. At the same time she has just as much freedom to join the group and observe or if she is in a really good mood play! The fact that they treat each dog according to each dogs personality and temperament speaks volumes! It is above and beyond and average doggie daycare! My pup is always excited to go to day care! She starts crying from excitement as soon as we turn off quintard. She is always extremely excited to see the staff, especially Alisha! 😉 (her second mom) Thank you to Alisha, Shannon, and all the Pipers staff for 3 years of great service!! 💖🐶

name: Elizabeth Blue
text: They took such good care of my dogs when we boarded them there for a long weekend. As part of their boarding price doggy day care, playing with other size-appropriate friendly dogs, is included!

name: Lisa Amerson
text: Good prices, easy to get reservations. Dog is always excited to go. Love that they take pics daily and I can see how Scout is interacting.

name: Stephen Mann
text: They've kept my dogs on several occasions and have always done a great job.  They are also very reasonably priced.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text: My fur babies look so awesome after their visit and the staff is wonderful. Found my new groomers

name: Erin Calvert
text:
This local Dog establishment is violating multiple heath codes. The owner of this facility and the manager were told on multiple occasions by employees and were aware of the following: Fire extinguishers (they only have 2) being extremely out of date, last checked back in 2015— also no evacuation plan, or safety drills, air vent maintenance doesn’t take place— vents/filters not properly maintained can easily catch fire, this company works with LIVE animals, the safety of your dogs are not being considered as you can tell from the images.... everything is layered with years of dog dander and hair.
When the heater gets turned on the smell of burning hair lasts for days and the company uses wax melts up front to mask the smells. They also stuff the vents they don’t clean with smell good beads to mask the smell.
Even daycare dogs are kenneled. Employees hang around upfront until around 9 when they decide to start putting dogs in daycare—- this means if you’re paying for a full day or even a half day of doggie daycare starting in the morning your furbabies are missing out on 2+ hours of socialization. This facility doesn’t properly clean the daycare room. And weeks worth of hair is noticeable near the drains in the daycare play areas, this is extremely unsafe for your animals/the employees. The smell in this building that’s separate from the building your drop off your dog is horrific. Dogs are left unsupervised in daycare, and the daycare supervision in maintained outside of the daycare rooms- so instead of dogs getting that one-on-one attention they are only monitored when barking has increased. Because of that, rooms aren’t cleaned right away causing burns on paw pads from dogs playing around in urine. Most dogs have to be ran through Grooming to be spot cleaned before leaving. Bored dogs have started eating the walls of this establishment because of the lack of social interaction they receive. This facility illegally mentioned to employees that they can not pay overtime to them when they have worked 40+ hrs. Because of this, I believe the care of the animals that go there are being affected.
During the recent snow storm an employee managed to chase a already nervous dog around the front lobby of this establishment causing him to run out of the front door. This dog was missing for a week and found with his hip shattered, and he had ate an entire toe off of himself.. this establishment paid his vet bill which included the cost of utilization. Clearly the proper training of employees is not being conducted. This facility also does not clean kennels often and when they do they use a dirty mop to wipe out the kennels. This is probably a factor to the outbreak of kennel cough they are currently battling.
Many times employees just feed  dogs breakfast without even bothering to clean the kennel first or move the dog to a clean kennel.. that means that they were eating breakfast in their own filth and kenneled with it until daycare started up. In It’s hard enough trusting someone, let along finding out an establishment you’re paying LOTS of money to is neglecting your animal. This establishment recently caused the death of a small 4 lb dog, and they are trying to cover it up. By deleting comments and blocking any negativity they receive. I refuse to be silent. This facility is anything but transparent!!!

name: Shannon gilmore
text: I wouldn't take my two babies anywhere else!! They love everyone there! My oldest dog is nervous around strangers and he doesn't hesitate to run up to everyone there. The groomer is amazing and I have never been disappointed. I have a 6 year old male dorkie (dachshund/Yorkshire terrier) and a 1 year old female schnorkie (schnauzer/Yorkshire terrier), who are both rescues. I recommend pipers to everyone

name: Faith Wright
text: Great place for our fur babies! They pups love to play and the staff all take good care of pets.

name: Rebekah Shierling
text:
They kept my lab for a few days. She has never been boarded or been to doggie daycare. She came back to me just the way I dropped her off. They were very understanding as to her walking for 15 minutes. They posted pictures of her playing daily! They said she enjoyed herself and they loved her. I would bring her back because for the first time in 6 years I didn't worry about picking my dog up and them being under stress, no walked enough, kept in a crate all day, or not being checked on plenty.

Thanks to piper's dogowners can rest easy knowing their pups are being pampered to the fullest in a clean environment!

I even called and ask if my lab could stay one more day one the day I was supposed to pick her up from our trip and they were happy to let her stay in her room!

resp.text: Can't wait to see Mocha again!

name: wild rose
text: It is a daycare ONLY!!!! THEY NO LONGER ADOPT DOGS OUT!

resp.text: Piper's Playhouse is a boarding, daycare, training and retail facility, but you are correct about the rescue. We had to close the Piper's Rescue in 2018 due to the lack of income to keep it running. We do work with other local rescues in order to continue helping in the community as much as possible. Piper's also holds drives for the the local animal shelters at least once a year to help in that aspect. Piper's Rescue a

name: Rachel Bonnett
text: Wonderful with my Tod his hairstyle always looks amazing.

name: Marilyn Hart
text: Piper's Playhouse has been a lifesaver!!! We recently got a very sweet but very high energy rescue...Smokey:)  They were not scared off by his hyper-self and have been a wonderful help in helping me make his entrances and exits not so wild LOL;). I live and work in Gadsden so add 3 hrs and 140 miles to each work day for Smokey to go there...it's worth all that extra effort bc I know he is well taken care of(they welcome me calling to check on him), having fun, and will be toast when I pick him up, which makes nights much more manageable;). This place of business is clean, professional, helpful, loving, and a blessing for dogs and dog owners!!!

name: Kate Upchurch
text: Prior to this past visit I'd have written a great review but when I picked my little guy  ( a shih tzu )up on Christmas Eve I was horrified! Shaking, limping and handed dirty bedding with no explanation as to how he was injured, why we weren't informed  when it happened plus finding out he'd been very stressed by being kenneled every night in the large room with the large dogs with big dog barks! When I first boarded @ Piper's 2 years ago I requested that he be kenneled at night with only little dogs and was shown a room off the hall on the right where I was told the small dogs stayed. When I asked why he was put in the big room this time with the big dogs she said "well, you didn't request that he be separated". If my file had been consulted I'm sure it would reflect my wishes. There was no I'm sorry we didn't contact you about his injury, etc. He literally had to be carried that night and Christmas day every time to potty, to food bowl, etc. While I understand this may not be the norm @ Piper's, ( had never happened to me before) since it happened this time, I'll be making other arrangements next time. Beware. Things are not always as they seem. Ask to see where your dog will be put at night. I was told they  NEVER allow tours! That's shocking! I've ALWAYS toured where I board my dog. Ask what their policy is if your dog becomes injured or sick. I asked when the owner would be there as I wanted to speak in person with them and was told the owner was never at the Anniston location. Really? So, I've emailed the owner to express my concerns.

name: Wilson, Brandon David
text: To fire one on leave seem real... despicable. More care is given to pups than those mental. If you've paid the piper you know who I am. The management's a joke, but current employees are grand.

name: Leisa Cole
text: My dog loves this place! People working here are GREAT!

name: Alabama Zephyr
text: Wonderful staff and a wonderful doggie day care! Thank you!

name: Lawanna Wade
text: Thanks to Pipers Playhouse  for taking care ol Handsome  for the Wades !

name: Shawanda Edison
text: Prices aren't what they advertise. But it's a nice place to take your pet and know they are in good hands.

name: Micah Morgan
text:
Highly recommended! Never had a complaint! My babies have been groomed here, boarded here and had play dates in daycare! If they were misbehaved I would have them in the training classes as well. There prices are very affordale plus they have just lowered the prices! They always have some new homemade nutritional snack for sale on the counter and tons of things to buy for your fur baby. Ranginger from shampoos to clothes to toys to collars and leashes. You will not be disappointed. Thank you Pipers for making it easier for me to go on vacation without being weary of how my babies are. Yall are awesome!

Also I would like to add with being a former employee of Pipers Playhouse. Know that your baby is well watched and takenjoy care of. Blankets, kennels and play areas are washed daily with non harmful chemicals.  They have very interactive play during daycare, someone is always watching and spending time with your furbaby. Medicine is well charted and given correctly.  Staff does their very best at making your pets stay as easy and comfortable as possible. The owner is the most compassionate person I have met and treat every animal with respect and love. You must check out Pipers for yourself!

name: NameIs Private
text: Great people great service.  Thank you

name: Ms. D.
text: The front desk worker helped me a lot.

name: Cory Clifton
text: Great place for doggy day care

text: My dog was boarded the weekend of July 4th. He was picked up today and reeked of urine as well as his bed that was sent. Highly disappointed and will not be using pipers playhouse again.

resp.text: I am very sorry you were disappointed with our services. Rudy (still being a puppy) did have accidents in his kennel at night. He also played VERY hard in doggie daycare each day. His bed and blankets were washed each day - but in the rush of dogs leaving today (July 5th) it was overlooked. I have addressed it with my Boarding Supervisor and it will not happen again! We are trying to let her hair grow out and get her groomed again through someone else because this lady really messed her up. I couldn't believe that she didn't bathe her. We won't be back.

The groomer is always sweet to them and you tell she genuinely cares for your family member. I e suggested everybody take thier dog to her shes awesome. Very affordable and excellent results

name: Karen Steward
text: She knows her stuff.

name: margie jarmon
text: I take my little dogs and get their haircut if she's a Christian lady it's close to home to

name: Thomas Querbach
text:
1st and hopefully not the last visit. Boarded my dog for a week. Show up today, and nothing I asked was done. Besides boarding, I asked for a nail trim, groom and bath. Upon arrival, none of this was done. Prior to me boarding him, I was told twice on the phone to mention to one of the girls when I arrived.

When I dropped him off on the 8th, I had requested these services to be done. The girl that was there said it would be done and that they would call if they had any questions. When I get him today, I find out none of this was written down on his chart. I think you need to train your employees to write down notes on our pet’s chart when busy or not to ensure items requested are done correctly. I only give this two stars because your comped me on a nail trim and bath.

resp.text: Thomas, we apologize that our timing did not meet your expectations.  We do delay baths on boarding dogs so they are freshly bathed when you arrive for pickup.  For your wait time, we did not charge you for the bath and nail trim in hopes to make up for your short wait time.  We apologize this did not meet your expectations.  If you would like to discuss further, please feel free to call our office and ask to speak with either Janet or Tara.

name: Danita Ezell
text: Made an appointment for my Yorkie to get groomed, They did not call or text to cancel, got there and that was that, would have been a 1st visit, and it is coming up for a holiday.🤦‍♀️

resp.text: I am sorry Danita that you had a bad first experience.  We tried to call customers to reschedule prior to arrival to let them know our groomer had a family emergency.  We apologize you didn't receive your call before you arrived.

name: M Smith
text: My dog seemed to have a great time at doggy day care. He was happy and tired when I picked him up. The staff is incredibly knowledgeable and kind. The facility appears clean.

name: Matthew Mayo
text: We take our dog rascal here for grooming and daycare regularly. He’s always so happy and excited to go, and comes home tired out at the end of the day, which is quite a feat for a jack russell. The groomer always does a great job with him, and he looks (and more importantly smells) like a million bucks after. I’ve recommended JHH to all of my friends.

name: Wendy Montealegre
text:
I LOVE Just Happy Hounds.  First, the facilty is spotless.  And their stellar staff truly love these animals.  It's genuine.
I do quite a bit a rescue, and sweet Sarah Mills, Katelyn and the rest of this amazing staff have boarded several rescues. Teaching these dogs basic manners training and socialization.  This work helps ensure they will have a successful adoption later!
Just Happy Hounds not only provides excellent care for your personal dog, they do extensive community outreach, and have saved countless dogs.  I can't say enough good about them!!!

name: james meredith
text: Very nice people. Stayed late to meet me so I could drop my dog off on a sunday!!!

name: Brittany Stephens
text:
My dog began daycare at JHH at approximately 6 months old and attended at least 2-3 times per week. I always thought she enjoyed it as she seemed excited to pull up and be dropped off. At around a year old, I started noticing a lot of staff turnover at the facility. Although I should have taken heed, I did not and my dog continued to attend day care regularly. I began noticing that my dog was very timid of the staff. In particular, she was called by one of the managers/trainers and immediately backed up, tail between her legs, and laid down in a submissive position behind me. This time I took note and my dog never returned to the facility. I still have pre-paid day care days that will go unused. When I inquired about my dog’s reaction, it was explained to me by staff that my dog was regularly kept separate in a kennel in the back during the day. AND, that her “training” involved being taken into the yard, on a leash, while other dogs were allowed to approach her and she was given commands to obey. THIS RUINED MY DOG. She has dog aggression issues to this day, largely due to her extreme anxiety which I believe was engrained into her at a developmental stage while at JHH. Please do not take your dog to this facility for daycare.

Also, please note that most of the favorable reviews were posted at least a year ago. While the more recent reviews question the dogs well-being at the facility.

name: Emma Tolbert
text: Terrible! I paid $74 per night for my 2 senior-age shelties to be boarded in the “Beach House” suite while I was out of town. When they were picked up they were soaking wet and filthy, as if they had been left outside in the rain. They were also hungry, and an excess of their food was left that should not have been if instructions were followed. Definitely would not recommend if you are looking for your pets to be well taken care of!

name: Christina Fortugno
text: Just Happy Hounds needs to be your first and last look at daycare for your best friend. I moved to Birmingham a few months ago and did not know a soul. I came for graduate school with my best friend (Oliver) and the center of my world. I shopped around for daycares like my peers do for their human children. I chose Just Happy Hounds because the staff was friendly and I loved how my dog was always playing. He does not spend hours alone in a kennel like he would at home. They have far exceeded my expectation for customer service and outright exceptional care for my puppy. Oliver had a scratched cornea from playing a little hard and required surgery. I was stressed about what to do. I thought I could not take him to daycare while he recovered for surgery. He required extensive medications and needed to watched more closely in the cone of shame. The JHH team took care of Oliver post-op just as well as I would have at home. I never have to worry about my best friend while I am at work/class all day. I know he is being loved and played with as he is at home. I could not be more thankful for such incredible care of Oliver during his time of extra need. As a nurse, I am always caring for everyone else. I have been incredibly thankful to have someone help me out and give me peace of mind. Never bring your baby somewhere else! Sarah and her team are incredible. JHH is the best home away from home you can bring you furry friend to.

name: Abigail Martin
text: I have been trying to contact them for the last ten days after my dog was groomed here. I have called and emailed to no avail and have heard nothing back. I have many concerns with how well he was supervised the hours he spent here.

name: Drew Griffith
text: I took Buddy for grooming Savannah the groomer did a excellent job in grooming Buddy. Buddy smells wonderful.  He was full of matts when I dropped him off and know he is not. Savannah has done the best job of any grooming place I have ever talking buddy to

name: Kayla Rivera
text: They are wonderful with my dog. I have needed to leave before on fairly short notice and they have always been accommodating. My dog comes back happy. I will always feel comfortable leaving my dog there.

name: Anna Waters
text: I take my dog here once a week,  and he loves it. He hasn't always gotten along with other dogs, but he is so much more sociable now after a few months of weekly daycare. The staff at JHH is so nice and helpful, and I trust their judgment. Their services are also really affordable. I can't recommend them highly enough.

name: Cj Paxton
text: I have a giant breed dog ( Cane Corse  @ 160 lbs. )  Sarah and her crew have been great with him. He loves going there to play and hang out. No other place want to work with him because of his size. Wish I lived closer to them we moved and he isn't able to go now but I will have vacation soon. And he will be there for 12 days.

name: Raphael Cohen
text: Pasta and ambiance are both good. Great lunch place

name: Matthew Spivak
text: My dogs HATE getting groomed, but JHH was incredible! I could tell they genuinely cared for my boys and went the extra mile to make them feel comfortable. My dogs were in a much better mood when I picked them up compared to other places.

name: Stephanie Agee
text: It was okay I had to keep calling for the groomer, after she was reached I took my puppy in for a bath in a couple of days he was oily

name: LaBrena Friend

name: mylilgigi2018 Mills
text:
Mrs Cole
Sorry you feel like this about JHH, but I can’t  imagine Sarah ever yelling at anyone her companion for what she does is above all.
The  dedication  she puts into running to JHH  is fabulous I wouldn’t put my baby anywhere else.

name: Bethany Cryder
text: Gracie loves her day care days.  I love the staff.  They treat her so wonderfully. Cannot recommend them enough.

name: Taylor Stroud
text: We have been taking our dog here for over a year now. She absolutely loves it. She gets excited whenever we ask her if she is ready "to go to daycare". They love taking care of our pup and do a great job. definitely recommend, especially those working close by at UAB and Children's

name: Terry Pribyl
text: Great service my dog loved the people. Kept my Lumpy for a day in a pinch, and didn't even charge us for the first visit.

name: Bryan Reed
text: Attended the Birmingham Bowl on the way home to Texas on a road trip.  I needed a place to keep our dog during the football game.  The folks at Just Happy Hounds were great.  My dog was actually sad to leave her newly acquainted canine friends.  I would highly recommend Just Happy Hounds!

name: mark gotfryd
text: The dog returned happy but lost weight. From being active all day or under fed??. She was returned with multiple bumps... insect bites... Flea?.. Gave her bravecto. The people are very very nice and obvious dog lovers...

name: Julie King
text: Friendly staff. 1st class care for your furbaby. Easy to find. Groomer does a great job. It's easy to get an appointment and prices are comparable to other less fancy places. There's a great vibe at Just Happy Hounds and I will continue to take my little beloved furbaby there! She got a groom that was precious but not as short as I needed for her comfort due to hotspots and they didn't hesitate to fix it for free. Great place!

name: Julie King
text: They do a good job and love my nany

name: Caywood Yamnik
text: I took my dog here for a year and a half and still they did not know her name, and called her a boy almost every time. The staff has very high turnover, and there seems to be a big internal communication issue.

name: Mark Reeder
text: Great way to get the extra energy out of our puppy plus learn socialization skills. Great place for boarding as well.

name: Kelly King
text:
I would like to say I’ve been to several doggie daycares and Just Happy Hounds by far is the BEST!!!!
You can really tell they care about your baby! I have to tell you about my experience with them today. I dropped my baby off for the first time today for her boarding I
was greeted by Sarah and Josh with warm welcomes. The others staff wanted to know exactly want Annabella need during her stay food, bath how much when. I have to say JHH has it together and I can tell Sarah is there because she loves the babies. Now I can go on my trip with no worries! Thank you JHH staff for all you do.

name: Shay Hoffman
text:
Very friendly staff however the groom on my Pomeranian wasn't quite up to snuff. I took him in at the end of March 2017 for an all over trim down to 1/2" (tail included), specific attention to his ears, and a sanitary cut.
The overall cut was uneven around his face, legs, and tail - it looked chunky, spots were missed and others cut too short. The sanitary cut was what I asked for but I noticed a razor burn/cut on the inside of his leg after we got home. They did a great job on his ears which is usually a tough spot so it seems odd that the other stuff was so spotty.
This groomer just doesn't seem to have the skill for my dog's coat or their prices. We won't be going back.

name: Leah Moseley Papp
text: My dog loves coming here and the staff is great.

name: Yashna Patel
text: My dog received an injury, it was hard to contact anyone who knew about the situation and management did not cooperate or empathize. My dog suffered a large bruise and blood spot on her back left leg. I had to call several times and finally got ahold of management. They did not find out how the injury happened and I finally had to take my dog to the vet. Also, I requested nail trimming while my dog boarded and they forgot to do so. I scheduled a drop off for my dog for boarding and no one was in the office to receive her though I let them know ahead of time. I definitely do not reccommend this place.

name: Dona Bonnett
text:
"We are so pleased with Just Happy Hounds Midtown.  The dog groomer did a fabulous job on Trouble, our 11 year old rescue dog and we definitely recommend Just Happy Hounds Midtown in Birmingham for anyone needing dog grooming, boarding, dog daycare or training. text: I had the best experience with Classy Pup. She was very professional, and did an awesome job grooming My puppy Gizzee'. She also has wonderful fragrances for puppies. I was very pleased, and I will definitely return for services in the future.

name: M Lowery
text: My dogs love Lisa and her assistants! Icee and Coco are always so clean and sweet smelling after a bath! Lisa does such a great job on the grooms- absolutely adorable!!

text: Lisa is wonderful! She loves what she does and always does a great job with grooming our two dogs. We have a toy Poodle and toy Australian Shepherd. She’s reliable, friendly, responsive, always accommodating making appointments and always takes care of our two dogs. We’d definitely recommend her!

I use Classy Pup in Hoover for my schnoodle Macee.  Lisa gets it done right! Never have to worry about a bad cut,  I highly recommend her services.
Sandy Moon

name: Leslie Shadwick
text: I’ve taken my Shih Tzu several places in town and I knew the minute I dropped my puppy off we would continue to use Classy Pup. I know she takes care of my puppy and does a great job grooming him. I will not take my puppy anywhere else. Classy Pup will forever be my groomer.

name: Sara W
text: Today we took our dog to Lisa at Classy Pup for the first time. Previously he has had some grooming anxiety, but Charlie ran right up to Lisa with no issues. He was also napping and very happy when I picked him up. It means a lot to us that he feels comfortable there. Lisa was extremely nice and I was very happy with his haircut. He had not been groomed for some time and I knew it was going to be a big job. You can tell that Lisa and her staff love the dogs they work with. Furthermore, this business is taking every necessary precaution to protect themselves and their clients from covid-19. Their space is very clean and decorated so nicely. We will definitely be coming back on a regular basis!

name: Lindsey Dobbs
text: The young lady is a talented groomer and the owner and staff were super nice and polite! The best grooming I've seen and had done for my dog in a long, long,  time! I definitely Recommend there service to anyone!!!ask for Lindsey if you want the best groomer in Birmingham!

name: Julie Orr
text: I called ahead to ask if they could just trim my dogs nails bc I have a large breed, short haired dog that I can bathe easily. They said no problem, when we got there they talked my husband into getting the dog a bath also. Our dog wasn’t ready to be picked up for 4.5 hrs and they didn’t even trim his nails! So, I have spent far more than originally intended and I will need to spend more money to have his nails done somewhere else. Will not be returning.

resp.text: We did not  talk your husband into a bath for your Rhodesian ridgeback! .When asked if the dog was here for a bath AND nails service your husband went outside to ask someone and came back in a few minutes later and said yes. We had bear scheduled for nails only and graciously found time to bathe him for you. Typically nails  are an in and out service for us. That is why he was here for several hours. Bears nails did NOT need to be done.... you were only charged $50 for a bath on an extra large dog.. You could have given us a call and we would have gladly waived the bath fee before leaving an untruthful post but not now. By the way he tipped us $10.00

name: Michael Chelewski
text: I called several places this morning to see if I could get my Great Pyrenees bathed, groomed, and hair cut with no availability.  I contacted Classy Pup and they told me to bring her right in.  The process took less than 3 hours, which is amazing for this breed of dog.  The cost was right in line with everywhere else I've brought her to.  Very friendly staff and they made my Great Pyrenees look wonderful!!!  Thank you!!! I strongly recommend Classy Pup!!!

name: Madie Taylor
text: If I could give Classy Pup zero stars, I would. I called and they said if I dropped my tiny dog off between 8am-10am they would fit her in. To my surprise when we arrived at 9:15am, they said she would be ready around 4Pm. This should have been the first red flag for me. At 4pm we drove to go pick her up. When we arrived, they said she would not be done until 5:30pm. My poor tiny pup had been put in a cage for over 8 hours! I can only pray they gave her water because when she got home she drank almost a whole bowl. She was one of the first dogs to arrive, but yet was the last dog they groomed. When I made the appointment they told me it would be $49. That sounded reasonable and fair. When we picked her up after asking for a teddy bear cut, her haircut looked awful. There are random clumps of hair that are twice as long as the other pieces. She still has hair in her eyes from the side where they gave her bangs? When a teddy bear cut does not have bangs on the sides. When she was picked up. It ended up being $60. Much more than they quoted me. If I were you, I would never ever bring your pet to this shop.

resp.text: Hi Ms Taylor!  We are trying our best to fit everyone in because of the covid19 virus.  That being said we have a lot of new customers we are trying to help , along with servicing our regular ones. If you would contact us we will do whatever it takes to fix your concerns. It would have been more courteous to contact us about your concerns before posting something like this.... because I cannot find your name anywhere on our schedule within the last 2 weeks to call you. We also warn EVERYONE right now that their pet might be here almost all day . We do the dogs in order of arrival and our drop off time is between 8 and 10 am. it is not unusual if your dog was dropped off at 915 it was one of the last dropped of, and one of the last to finish up with.  Also.. we have no grooming packages priced at $49.00. Our bath and tidy's are $48 for our small dogs, and $58 for a full groom. we charge a $2 convenience fee for payments made with a credit card. Debit cards no convenience fee. Also keep in mind that it sometimes takes a time or 2 to get your puppy styled exactly as you because we don't know them , especially if you are new! We have been in business 37 years and if we were poor groomers that wouldn't be the case. Our longevity speaks for itself!

name: Survivor Girl
text: I have been taking Maxx to Classy Pup for least 6 years. Lisa is always professional and she does a wonderful job grooming Maxx. I have no worries when I drop off because I know when I pick him back up, he will well groomed and smells 10 times better. If you are looking for a professional dog groomer then Classy Pup is your place. I know it is mine!

name: Terry Hall
text: Lisa has been so patient with me. I had to cancel on her after her going to work my fur baby. I called her back and she set my baby up for today. I am so excited, I can’t take my eyes off of him he is so cute. My mother took care of my dog for many years and she would be crazy about his new look. Thanks Lisa for making him so beautiful today! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

name: Sheri Arnold
text: First class service!  I have a (big) standard poodle and they did an amazing job with my 9 month old boy.  He is still new to grooming and they were very patient and caring with him.

name: Kathy Petro
text: Just started taking my dog here - and I love it!!! I have an older dog, and they were so sweet to him. Very impressed with the service and friendly staff.

name: matt harel
text:
I made a first attempt at an appointment for my two small poodle mixes on Friday 4/10 to be groomed on Saturday 4/11. Seemed easy enough. They asked me to have the dogs at the shop between 8-10a.

My mother fell ill Friday night, and I immediately took her to the urgent care Saturday morning, which was the morning I was scheduled to bring the dogs in. With the current health pandemic plaguing our country, and specifically Jefferson county, I immediately focused on getting my mother the healthcare needed. Unfortunately, I failed to inform Classy Pup, and missed my appointments.

I called this morning, Monday April 13th, and I apologized and tried to explain the predicament I was placed in on Saturday. Whomever I spoke with was extremely rude, and would not let me finish speaking without overpowering and overwhelming the conversation. She at some point mentioned I’m required to pre pay for both dogs (mind you I’ve never used their service and don’t know how I feel about prepaying), as well as for the appointments I missed? Because I didn’t give them a 24 hour notice? My mother fell ill the evening before the appointments were scheduled, it would be impossible to give a 24 hours notice for this.

It was all very bizarre, and confusing. I’ve used the same groomer for five years, and she recently went out of business and moved states; I’m certain I can find another groomer to take care of my dogs’ needs, but it’s shameful Classy Pup is so tone deaf and belligerent. Terrible customer service. The lady I spoke to even hung up on me. Again, with COVID-19 shuttering businesses left and right, you would think Classy Pup would be happy with two new clients, but unfortunately that doesn’t seem to be the case.

resp.text:
Hi Matthew, well wishes to your mother. You spoke with me the owner.  As I remember our conversation it was several days after your appointment you called to make another one.  No mention of your mothers illness and a very lighthearted  attitude about your missed appointment.  That is a huge deal to a small business, being that we had a hole of 2.5 blocked off hours in our schedule due to your dogs not coming in. Businesses cannot operate that way! And it was an appointment blocked off for 2 dogs... not one.   Our business model requires a prepayment deposit to be make after 2 missed appointments, that will be credited to the following appointment. Two dogs no showing is 2 appointments missed and lost revenue for us. We are not always able to fill those appointments last minute, as was the case. This is only our way of insuring that we will not have an empty slot in the future, not a  harsh personal attack as you infer.
Regards, Lisa

name: Jessica Stodden
text: We just rescued a Pomeranian and needed a place to get her groomed. Lisa and her helper were so friendly and did a great job! We will definitely be back! Thank you!!

name: Mara Okshteyn
text: Lisa is great! My dog loves her!

name: Alyssa Branton
text: I had a great experience at Classy Pup! Lisa was so helpful and personable. She kept my little dog safe and cozy while I was stuck at work. I also love the cut she gave my Yorkie!

name: Tammy Holston
text: I love Classy Pup!  I've taken my dogs there for years.  Lisa, the owner, always does her best to accommodate my schedule- even when I schedule an appointment last minute.  Good cuts at a good price too! ❤️

name: Grace Arello
text: They did such an amazing job on my dog and were so friendly and prompt !!! I have been bringing her back ever since I loved them so much I brought my moms dog too!!

name: Diane Burns
text: Lisa, the owner, is very friendly, professional and loves my dog! she is an excellent groomer and knowledgeable on dogs' health as well! Thanks for taking care of my dogs all these years! she has seen me through 3 dogs!

name: Matthew Martin
text:
We rarely leave a review on google, but decided I would since we never received a call back from the owner. My family and I moved to the Hoover area earlier this month and decided to try this groomer out. The owner was very friendly and the staff was great at arrival. Once the doggy cut was complete we went home and didn’t think anything about looking for imperfections with the groomer’s work. Once we got home we noticed that he had been severely cut around his face and has been bleeding for a week since the cut. His haircut  was also patchy and not cut to the standard we are accustomed to. The following week my wife tried multiple times to get I touch with the owner and was unable to get her on the phone or by visiting the salon. We spoke to her sister and left a message, and to no avail have we heard back. The haircut was around 65$ after tax and the matting fee. I as very disappointed in the lack of follow up and quality of work done. My dog still has scars on his face from the haircut. Please use this groomer with caution.

I wish we could upload pictures but google will not allow. We tried to handle this in-house for the past week and a half, but have heard nothing back from the groomers.

resp.text:
We rarely get bad reviews, but we do not look at it negatively.  On the contrary, we look at them as a chance to improve and enhance our business practices and take your suggestions.  This one has us very perplexed.Accidents do happen, but we would never send a dog home knowingly injured without notice and explanation.
I have checked out client sheets and have not found a Matthew M. signed in or  a charge for $65.  We are not in the office when we do not have clients scheduled, nor do I have a sister who works here. I have a small smooth coated dog and I know every  bump, swirl or wrinkle on that dogs body, and would immediately know if there was a cut or any abnormality on him . Once a dog leaves our care however, we have no control over what happens to him... but after a week????  We also have a waiver  clearly stating out policies on our client sheet that must be signed before drop off. We carry insurance and also have cameras installed. It is distressing that something happened to your dogs face. but if we didn't see. it we couldn't point it out to you!

name: Sharon Daniels
text: Lisa at Classy Pup has always taken such good care of our dog, Coconut.  We never think of going anywhere else.  We highly recommend her!

name: Kendyl Webb
text: First impressions mean a lot, and my first impression was horrible. The business is located in the downstairs of a building which you access from behind the building. There is no sign indicating this at the front of the building. When I arrived I parked up front and opened the front door to find an abandoned filthy building. I quickly closed the door and ran back to my car. I almost left then, but decided to drive around behind the building. That is when I saw the downstairs door. The upstairs door should be locked with a sign instructing you to go around back. When you get inside everything looks dated, but that's not the problem. I dropped my dog off at 1030. I was told that she would be done around 2 possibly 3 but that I would receive a call 30 minutes before she was ready. I was also told that she would be taken out of the kennel to walk and for a potty break (although there's no grass for this that I saw). At 1:30 I called to check and was told that it would definitely be 3 but that she would call 30 minutes before she was done and she sounded aggravated that I called. At 230 my husband and I decided to leave to pick up some lunch before picking the dog up, and at 309 I still hadn't heard from her. At that point my dog had been there almost 5 hours so I just headed straight there. I got there and she was still working on my dog but only for about 5-10 more minutes after I got there even though I hadn't received a call that she was 30 minutes from being done. Almost as soon as my dog was on the floor she peed which leads me to believe she was never walked or taken out to potty. She was shaved WAY shorter than I asked for her to be. I asked for a simple trim and instead she was shaved with a #5 blade. The lady argued with me and told me that I told her to cut her short, which I did not do. I was also told that it would be 50$ and I was charged 55$. We will not be back here.

resp.text: Hi Kendra!  Gee.. if you had a problem I wish you would have taken it up with me before you proceeded to write many inconsistencies!  First.... the upstairs building does not belong to me..... and Lorna Music just moved out with in a weeks time... and is in the process of cleaning it up! Our sign clearly shows the entrance to our business is the bottom level!   Secondly.... we were nice enough to take your Maltese withOUT an appointment and work it in around our other regular customers.  Our regular price for our small dogs is $55.00 and I usually charge a bit more for people without appointments .. so thats what we get for being nice to first time customers! Thirdly.... your dog was the LAST to come in... so it was the LAST to go out. It wouldn't have been fair to the other owners now.... would it?  Lastly... your dog was not in good shape so it had to be taken down short as I explained when you picked her up. Your dog also pee pee'd and poo poo'd in her cage as soon as you  dropped  her off so yes... she was walked thoroughly after that..... and Yes.... we have a very large dog run right next to the shop which you again did not observe... and plenty of grass out back!  I'm sure you can find another groomer that is better suited for you.             Lisa

name: Mallie B
text: I have a very nervous and scared little 7 month Yorkie because of her past groomer. Bella Rose is a very difficult baby to deal with. Instead of saying she would not groom her again, Lisa is working with me and giving me recommendation to talk to her doctor about. That is amazing and shows she  really loves what she does. Do not pay attention to any bad reviews. I'm hear to tell you that Lisa was in constant contact with me all day and even tho my baby was a terrior, she looked amazing. We will not use anyone else.

name: Sandra Slate
text: I have been using Classy Pup for over a year with my Shihtzu/Bichon. They do a great job and always call as soon as he is ready. He is not scared to go in which says a lot to me after some experiences at other places that he did not want to stay.

name: Jessika Ashlee (Hip and Simple)
text: New to the area and first tried a chain pet store for grooming and they were terrible. On this next grooming I tried Classy Pup today and it was great. They shaved our Pomchi, she looked great and they listened to our requests to have a short tail trim and to leave her face whiskers which was very appreciated but most groomers forget when we specify that request. We did a bath and nail trim for our other dog. He looked and smelled great. They were friendly and really seemed to care and like interacting with the dogs. Pricing was very comparable to other places I have looked into. We will use them again.

name: Megan Schrimsher
text: I drive from Trussville to Hoover just to take my fur babies to Classy Pup. The owner is so attentive to my scheduling needs and loves my fur babies as if they were her own. I definitely recommend you making this your go-to groomer!

name: Katrina Knight
text: Friendly staff my baby was gorgeous!!!!

name: laurie lawson
text: Highly recommend.My dogs coat was a mess when I brought him in and he looks AMAZING now!! Sweet ladies and you can tell they love what they do.

text: The best dog groomer in Hoover!

name: whatever gaming
text: Store in Shambles. Big Lady was in corner by office eating a bag of chips and she's already 350 lbs easy. Low representation of the store. No help visible in shopping aisles. Had to wait a few minutes for a cashier to come help us. Fire your GM..

text: I Love Dollar general it's where you go great prices and you can find everything you need and want.

Great products. I drive over 40 minutes to this store, because of healthier/organic selection. Owner was super helpful and very nice. Added bonus, you can bring your dog and give them a bath and the store provides all supplies for a very reasonable price.
Love this store!

name: James Reed
text: Manager was incredibly knowledgeable about dog nutrition and happily shared his knowledge.  They have a good variety of dog and cat food.  They have a good variety of products for toys, shampoos, over the counter meds etc.  If military they do give a 10% discount.  I highly recommend this store to anyone with pets.

name: Courtney Martin
text: The absolute best place for supplements and dog baths!! My dog loves getting baths here. The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is nice.

name: Amy Shipman Guiles
text: I have been here a couple of times after winning a basket of dog treats/food/toys that they donated for an event. The owner was helpful in finding some food for my sensitive stomach puppy and gave me a few additional sample bags of puppy food. The second time I went, the worker was friendly and helpful as well.  They have a good selection of dog/cat foods, toys, leashes etc, plus it appears there's a groomer section of the business. I will definitely be going back and buying locally from them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!  We are here to help if you need us.

name: Anna Ramirez
text: This is a wonderful place to get products for your pets.  Whenever I have questions they are more than willing to answer them, if needed they will give me a sample of the item to see if it works with my dogs. My dog had several problems with dog food and I finally found something that works beautifully.  I would recommend EarthWise Pets to everyone.

name: Lisa Nicolella
text: Friendly staff! Great selection, the owner really believes in the products that he carries. Clean and well stocked as well! A great place to buy food other than the big box stores, they will take care of you here :-)

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We are here to serve our community and try our best everyday.

name: Jess Eve Jason
text: purchased off the web, waiting 2 weeks for order to be filled. Spoke to owner said to wait, I am still waiting. ?? Owner stated 24 bags of treats would be delivered to me, now refunded after 3 weeks. VERY UNPROFESSIONAL,DO NOT RECOMMEND - U SHOULD HONOR YOUR WEBSITE. Your web page still says .99 cents for 90 ct.  LIMIT 6 - JOKE - SCAM ( STILL WAITING FOR PRODUCT OR MY REFUND). August 13, 2020 Still waiting for my $24 refund or items as promised.

resp.text: Sorry you were not satisfied with the product. But .99 cents for 90 items, we wish we could get prices like that. We are processing the update to our mistake on the website and have taken your recommendation for the change. Have a great day!

name: Will Miller
text: Great 1st experience!  Prices and product selection were great and I was equally as impressed by the brands I didnt see. This seems to be a pets 1st pet store and the staff seems very knowledgable (this coming from someone who’s done 10+ years of pet nutrition training). I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Sir!  We are here to serve.

name: Natalee Ricks
text: I love this pet store! I come here often because I know they only have things that are good and safe for my baby! They have a wide selection of the best brands on the market, all for very decent prices. The only negative thing I could say is that even though “grooming” is in the name, they do not offer cat grooming. But that is hard to find anywhere, so it’s not an issue. Overall my favorite pet store in the area!

name: Courtney Smith
text: The staff was super helpful and had answers to all of my questions! We went in today for the Halloween pictures and treats and my pup Axel loved it! We will definitely be back really soon! Thanks again so much for your kindness and information!

name: Chris Bouffard
text: Able to easily walk in and do self grooming. Have a great setup to personally wash your own dog at working height. Staff is always super friendly and nice to my dogs.

name: Madison Morgan
text: Our favorite store for all our pet needs! The products are amazing and the staff is even better! Highly recommend!

name: Jennifer Strother
text: We had our doodle groomed here and I loved it. The service was great and the groomers have tons of experience. We even left with some natural dog treats. My mother in law was looking for a particular brand that no one else had and we were able to find it here. We will definitely return for our dog services.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review!  We can't wait to see Piper back in the salon!

name: Ashley Fletcher
text: The staff is wonderful! I took my cocker spaniel there to be groomed and he looks great. Would highly recommend!

name: Barbara Hagood
text: Spoke to the owner, very knowledge in the  field of nutrition. Great looking store and employees. Met  the groomers on site and a great total experience! Will definately be shopping there!

name: Lucie LeBlanc
text: I have been so impressed by the owners . They have a true family friendly environment. They have excellent customer service, professional knowledge about dog food, and they have been so welcoming to my crazy puppy, Milo. Every single week I walk in, for baths, treats, and food, I walk out smiling because they treat us so well.

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting us!

name: Paul Dietrich. SR
text: Helpful employees really know the extensive collection of products offered for sale. Reasonable prices, compact and attractive displays make shopping there a pleasant  experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Sir.  We appreciate our customers and do our best to serve the community!

name: Dawn Frontz
text: Staff were very friendly and knowledgeable about the products.  Quality dog foods at competitive pricing.  We will be back.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review!  We look forward to seeing you.

name: alicia perez
text: Good place for quick gourmet pet food. Staff isn't very friendly. Wasn't greeted when first walking in. And wasn't asked if I needed any help till I was bout ready to check out. When I did check out, and was paying the lady ringing me up didn't even look at me. Not my best experience. This was on a Tuesday afternoon....

resp.text:
I'm so sorry you had this experience.  We try our best, but as a Family run new business we can sometimes allow ourselves to focus on other areas of caring for the store. We appreciate your business and will try harder to do our best and continue focusing on our most important assets, our customers!

Please allow us to give you a 10% discount on your next visit as a token of gratitude! Just mention you left the 3 Star rating...Enjoy your day!

name: Heather Evitts
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review...we always do our best to please our customers!

name: Catherine Blackwood
text: I was lucky to find Earthwise Pet.  I have a very finacky 7 lb dog.  The staff was so helpful and kind.  I tried the food they recommended and for the first time he ate with no problems.  I will shop there many more times.

resp.text: We are so glad you found us!  Helping responsible Pet Parents, like yourself, is what makes us HAPPY!

name: Barb Higgins
text: The grooming at Earthwise this past weekend was terrible. I took my to pups into the groomer for baths and trim. They smell like they were washed in dirty dog water and definitely did not get trimmed. If I could give them zero stars, I would. Horrible service and when I called to discuss with the owner...I found out I was over charged too. I will never use their service again.

resp.text: So sorry you had a bad experience. We will do our best to improve!  Unlike some large corporate stores, we are new local small business owners and veterans at EarthWise Pet, and we take pride in doing our best. Unfortunately, we can occasionally have off days and we apologize. Our groomer appreciated your tip $$ when you picked you fur babies up from the salon, which would seem to indicate you were happy with the service, only for us to find out later you were not.  At any rate, we are sorry to lose your business, but in the future for others benefit, please allow someone a chance to make things right for you if you are unhappy.  Have a great day!

text: Excellent information and help choosing the right pet food for us, and though we are upgrading in quality we aren't having to pay more! I'm thrilled, and my dog loves the food.

resp.text:
We are sorry you had a bad experience.  :(

We make every effort to discuss the service with our customers to ensure they are happy before they leave the salon...even if we have to do some last minute touch ups/fixes.  We are not perfect and sometimes may forget to reattach a collar during check-out and hope our clients will let us know before they leave the salon if this happens by mistake.

Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention, it will definitely help us to improve in the future.  Have a great day!

text: Wanted to find a local groomer. Read reviews and asked neighbors and some referred me here. Was very hesitant of using a new groomer but was not visiting area where original groomer in near future. Gave groomer notes and sounded like all was understood. I understood my younger dog had knots in her hind legs and hair would possibly be cut short but never this. Gave my Scottish terrier a kennel cut!!!!!!!!   Enough said!! This shows lack of experience and very poor execution on team. If I had not paid before seeing my two girls, would have requested a full refund. Do not let the good reviews fool you. My other dog might’ve looked decent at glance but it is all square cuts no tapering like used to with my old groomer. I had trust in you Waggy tail. We will never come here again. Please remove us from your list of customers. As soon as my dog’s  hair grows back which now seems like will be an eternity, my girls will go back to our wonderful groomers in mountain brook where they are experienced beyond years and know what they are doing.

name: Trenton Wood
text: Our  dog was acting very strange. She was staggering around, and couldn't stand. She was also foaming at the mouth. We suspected poison, so we immediately rushed her here. The next day we found out she had died over night. Dr. Baxter had no explanation, as to why. She didn't have her stomach pumped, or anything. It seemed liked nothing helpful had really been done in attempting to save her life. I feel as though if we had taken her to another vet, she might still be alive, I would not recommend Animal Health Care to anyone.

name: Brandon McCurry
text: dr baxter and his staff are some of the best most caring kind and compassionate i know i recently lost my little fur child molly he was compassionate kind and caring and thats hard to find in a doctor of any kind if all doctors were the same his staff take incredible care of the animals that come and those that stay in the kennels. dr baxter has a brilliant mind and hes like an expert so i respect and value his advice it was hard to say good bye but molly had an infected uterus and then infection was causing her body to shut down there was nothing anyone could do i hugged him and he left me to make my decision i couldnt just let my baby suffer so we chose to put her to sleep i was allowed to hold her paw and gaze into her eyes as she left this world and entered the spirit world. he then hugged me and his nurse wrapped my baby in her blanket and i brought her home and buried her under her favorite tree. dr baxter sent me a card that helped my mourning and meant alot he said i did the right thing now tell me what doctor would that other than a truly compassionnate person i give 5 stars

text: We HAVE to stop at Sweetpeas whenever we go to the beach! The staff is always friendly and their assortment of styles is amazing! We always leave with something cute for our sweet boy! name: Barrett Lee
text:
You'll find a very nice assortment of locally made and cute items for your puppy and kitty friend! I was blown away by how many different choices here from floor to ceiling of everything furbaby!

There's a very nice selection of natural treats and they don't do rawhide! Matter of fact they offer healthy and tasty homemade treats and goodies like Calla's Peanut Butter & Honey Chewies, Bacon Cheeseburger, P.B. and Berry Bitty Bones, Lily-bug's Bacon Cheddar Chews & more.

They have so many cute items that can be personalized. The options are limitless and personalization right there in the store can be done in minutes, seriously , and they do custom jobs on almost anything and if you're interested in choice for the custom bandanas or other accessories, fear not, there's 500 different fabrics to choose from! You don't have a harness, they can tailor make it and you can tell they're made to last and made with love, nice.

While we're talking special stuff the folks here offer and big line of all-natural made in the U.S.A. shampoos, spritz and butters in what they call "Wiggle Butts Spa", cute. But seriously if you have a sensitive or allergic furry friend then this might be an answer here to chemicals that are unsatisfactory.

Leslie, the owner, is super informative and, if she is not there, there's a very knowledgeable and enthusiastic staff of fur baby lovers and professionals, they're all great to interact with and are eager to answer questions.

Bottom line: This is a total gem of a little shop with a huge selection of great stuff with a  staff is professional, knowledgeable, super friendly and their customer service the best. Very highly recommended!!!

Great shop with a ton of adorable handmade pet accessories and treats. Staff are super friendly and offered to customize and/or monogram accessories for us.

You cannot beat the price for the craftsmanship that is put into these collars!!!

text: Now, who does not like Dollar General?  No one ever, AND if you are in Hepzibah and you suddenly have a great need for some diaper rash medecine or diapers or cat litter or a toilet plunger, well what would you do without this Dollar General?  You would be in DEEP DOO DOO.  Yep, you would be driving forever down the road cuz you are a long way from everything down here.  This place is awesome, an oasis in this little country community.  OK, this is one of those heavy use locations that they can not stock and clean as fast as the country folk buy it up and track in mud.  If I was a cashier I would put summa y'all in yo place too.  Stop in and get some of those peanuts too, the best ever.

name: Pamela Lee
text: Please be sure and watch carefully when trying to use coupons or get your $5.00 a week off. I think I have it figured out, and then get up to the register to only find out they add some discounts in BEFORE the tax is added, the it does not add up to $25.00, so you don't get the additional $5.00 off. When you're stuck in line, with alot of people behind you, you're on the hook to just pay and leave. They do not help you with this either, and most times the buy so much, get so much off does not work at checkout, and 9 times out of 10, the sale prices are not marked in the store,  so you don't even know you're getting them until you look at your ticket.  It takes alot of work and time to save money at Dollar General using the app coupons. If you can figure it out, it might be worth it, but be careful, you will end up spending far more than you want to, and that's no deal !!!!

text: So pleased with the service at Doggie Do's! My first time bringing my poodle, Piper in. She looks so good, smelled great and their prices were very reasonable. I will definitely be bringing her back. Thank y'all so much!

resp.text: Piper was a pleasure to work with! Thank you for your business!

name: Laura Sirles
text: I love the staff at Doggie Do's! They're always so nice and Clyde leaves looking adorable every time we go. We visited several other groomers in Hueytown before we tried this one - they're by far the best! I recently learned they also do boarding, so we look forward to giving them a try next time we're out of town.

resp.text: Thanks Laura! We just love Clyde and enjoy what we do! Thanks for the opportunity to serve you and we look forward to many more future visits with your sweet guy.

name: Robbie Norris
text: Our Babies seemed very happy when they came home, will definitely use again! Next trip I want them to get the works and get use to the groomers.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and your business.

resp.text:

Thank you for your business.

text: Very good with our pet. They do a great job with her hair.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate your business.

It is so comforting to know their caring staff
takes care of our fur babies like family.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We appreciate your business.

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer. Daisy is a doll and we so much appreciate your business.

text: They are very good people, our pets have been treated awesome,  and they do a great job on their grooming, and bed and biscuits is a great service also. We will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

name: 2Badcats
text: Dropped our pup off for a 1- night stay so we could spend the day celebrating our anniversary. As always, he was perfectly happy when we picked him up the next morning. It is obvious that Alesia & John love and take great pride in their work. We have used them for grooming, daycare & boarding over the past few years and have been completely pleased.

resp.text: Thanks Susan! Love you guys especially Mr. B. ♡♡♡♡

name: Dena Dalton
text: The kindest and most caring groomers I've met or used. I have a golden rescue who is scared of strangers. The owners took the time to approach and make friends with my pup so that my pup and I are completely comfortable. I love how my pup smells when I pick him up, and the fees are affordable. Great, great people!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Deana! We appreciate the opportunity to serve you!

name: 2 Badcats
text: Our pup has been a loyal customer of Doggie Do's for about 3 years now. We take him there for grooming, boarding & some days just to hang out. He loves them, and so do we. Alesia & John are talented, kind folks and it is clear that they truly love their work. We gladly give them the highest recommendation possible.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind review! You guys, especially Bailey, have found a spot in our hearts.

She really like to go and see John most of all
Thanks yall for all the love and hard work ya'll do

resp.text: Thank you all. We just love Evie Jane ♡♡

text: They did an amazing job on my fur baby

resp.text:

Let us know how we can improve so as to gain your 5 star review!

resp.text: Thanks so much Melissa! You know we love Trigger too!

text: They were very good.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice review! It's our pleasure to serve you and get to know your furry friend!

text: I would like to say that even though I have only spoken to Doggie Do's regarding bathing my baby and the new puppy hotel they will offer - I am very impressed and pleased.  Scheduling conflicts have kept me from bring my baby in but I will be using them many times during the upcoming winter months and when I go on vacation.  Love they are so close to my area.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really are looking forward to the boarding facility opening and better serving our community!

resp.text: Thanks Tracy! Luna is a sweetheart ♡

text: We LOVE Doggie Do's!!!  Took our boxer there for his first grooming experience and they made us feel at such ease about leaving him.  They are wonderful people who care greatly for the animals that they work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and great review!

name: lanie parker
text: I have 4 little girls, two of which need special handling due to health issues.   Hope, Gracie, Lola and Abby loves to visit DoggieDoo.   I don't worry because I know they are taking good care of my animals.   I could not be more pleased with the care and attention given to us.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Brandy Finke
text:
I am so glad they are here for me.  I have a German Sheppard and I can't handle giving her a bath.  They give her a bath and they also provide defurmination which cuts down on the shedding.  I don't know what I would do without them.
They take such good care of her.  If she is there when it storms, they give her extra loving because Bella is scared of thunder.  They love on her like she is one of their own.

resp.text: Thanks so much Brandy! We appreciate you and the kind words!

name: amee sully
text: We love Doggie Do's! We never have to worry about Jax when he is in their care! He always smells great and looks handsome when I pick him up! I would recommend Doggie Do's to anyone looking for a groomer!!

resp.text: Thanks Amee! Jax is a doll!

name: Lauren Barnett
text:
Doggie Do's is by far the BEST place to get your pet groomed and cared for. I live in Argo which is a 45 minute drive to Concord just to have my Maltipoo Bella groomed and she always looks amazing when I pick her up. Everyone in my family takes theirs dogs here and we always will!!!! Thanks Alesia and John for always taking care of our fur babies! Y'all are the BEST!!

Lauren

resp.text: Thanks Lauren for the kind words! Bella is always an angel and we love you and your family! Thanks for your loyalty and the opportunity to serve you.

name: Michael Williams
text: Quick clean comfortable great work

resp.text:
Thanks for your review but I don't see you as a client in our database.
Please let us know how we can improve to gain your 5 star review!

name: mary harris
text: I live in Gardendale and I pass many other places that I could take my pets for grooming, but I drive to Doggie Do's because they care for my fur babies as if they were their own. I now have 5 fur babies that will have to be groomed and taken care of and asked my husband if he thought we should find a place closer to our home because getting 5 dogs to Bessemer may be a hassle. He said absolutley not because he doesn't think that we would ever get the service, passion or concern that the people of Doggie Do's put into each and every fur baby that is brought to them. If you are like me and think of your pets as part of the family, then you will find no better place than Doggie Do's.

resp.text: Mary,  thank you so much! Your kind words have brightened our day and I love your babies!

name: Jamye Holt
text: Today was the first of many to come. I called for a same day appointment as luck was on my side they said I could bring my Miss Lil Bitt in at 3pm. I was a little nervous about the first time visit but the moment I walked in the door the feeling was gone . I have never taken her to such a fabulous groomer since no longer being able to take her to Villa Rica GA.  Doggie Do's was extremely fast and did  awesome  on my poodle.

name: Christy Thomas
text: Great place everyone is very friendly and they are awesome groomers my dog was and is very happy to come here

text: Very rude on phone definitely need to brush up on Customer service skills wouldn't take my dog after rude encounter on phone

resp.text: I'm sorry Mrs. Patricia Mattox but you were 45 minutes late without even a phone call. When we called to let you know we would have to reschedule you started yelling obscenities and our phone etiquette comes across as rude? You actually called the owner a b*tch. We don't do business with people who disrespect us this way. Have a great day and I'm sure there are other businesses which you've never stepped foot in that you'd like to go troll and leave ugly reviews.
